message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. It comes packed with features that will enhance your daily experience. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I would like to extend an initial offer of $150 for it. I believe this price reflects its true worth and I'm confident it will be beneficial for you. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
